title: Aralon: Forge and Flame 3d RPG Mod v1.8
description:
Aralon: Forge and Flame 3d RPG v1.8

The Throne of Aralon sits empty, and the noble families of Callaheim struggle to control the future of the kingdom.

"That which once was, may yet be again. From ash and sorrow, a hero shall arise, wreathed in shadow, forged in flame. . ." [color=green]-The Chronicles of the 3rd Age[/color]

Features:
 Massive World to Explore!
 Controller support
 Tons of items
 Tons of weapons
 3 Races and 4 Classes with skill trees
 Real time Shadows
 First Person and 3rd person view
 Day and Night Cycle

Whatâ€™s In The MOD: (works offline)
Unlimited Money

Whatâ€™s New: v 1.8
-fixed bug with missing character name
-fixed mising shadows on some devices
-other minor fixes

Install APK,Place data folder in SDCard/Android/Obb/ and play.
Required Android O/S : 4.2+
